xwikidoc.content: {{velocity wiki="false"}} #if("$!{request.outputSyntax}" == 'plain') $response.setContentType('application/xml') #end #set($input = $escapetool.sql($request.get("input").toLowerCase())) #set($sql = "select distinct doc.web from XWikiDocument as doc where lower(doc.web) like '%${input}%' order by doc.web asc") #set($queryResult = $xwiki.search($sql, 30, 0)) #set($results = $queryResult.toArray()) <results type="8"> #foreach($res in $results) <rs id="$velocityCount" info="">$res</rs> #end </results> {{/velocity}}
